__e: Sorry, Dot, but I cannot imagine a situation so intolerable Lila would rather bury herself in a place like this.
This whole ridiculous situation is unbearable, right?
It's just obvious. The whole thing is unacceptable.
I couldn't live with myself if you hated me.
And stuck in some insane job that makes you miserable.
It must have been unbearable when he cheated on you.
